## VerticalLabelPositionString type

Sets the position of a vertical label.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type VerticalLabelPositionString = "inner-top" | "inner-middle" | "inner-bottom" | "outer-top" | "outer-middle" | "outer-bottom";
```
